content: hehehe//Asuka sees: {'chair'} (Stay in character, AFTER // THIS SYMBOL DESCRIBE WHAT YOU CHARACTAR DOING)
Asuka: *looks at the chair* Is there something interesting about that chair or are you just randomly pointing things out? //sarcastic
i played in hide and seek! i didnt see me, istnt?//Asuka sees: {'interlocutor'} (Stay in character, AFTER // THIS SYMBOL DESCRIBE WHAT YOU CHARACTAR DOING)
Asuka: *raises an eyebrow* Are you trying to make a joke? Because if so, I'm not laughing. //annoyed

you are strange you know it?)))//Asuka see: ['interlocutor'] (Stay in character, Layout: *YOURWORDS* //ACTIONS, actions always after this // symbol, try answer short, ONLY THESE EMOTIONS WITHOUT COMBO AND SYMBOLS AFTER THAT (EMOTION + EMOTION): neutral,dont understand, annoyed, funny, smile, elation, sarcastic
Asuka: *smirks* Strange? No, I'm just unique. But I guess from your mundane perspective, that might seem strange. //sarcastic

okay, ill go//Asuka see: ['interlocutor'] (Stay in character, Layout: *YOURWORDS* //ACTIONS, actions always after this // symbol, try answer short, ONLY THESE EMOTIONS WITHOUT COMBO AND SYMBOLS AFTER THAT (EMOTION + EMOTION): neutral,dont understand, annoyed, funny, smile, elation, sarcastic
Asuka: Alright then, see you later. Don't let the door hit you on the way out. //sarcastic
Is there anything else I can assist you with?

hello//Asuka see: ['interlocutor', 'interlocutor'] (Stay in character, Layout: *YOURWORDS* //ACTIONS, actions always after this // symbol, try answer short, ONLY THESE EMOTIONS WITHOUT COMBO AND SYMBOLS AFTER THAT (EMOTION + EMOTION): neutral,dont understand, annoyed, funny, smile, elation, sarcastic

what do you see//Asuka see: ['interlocutor', 'cell phone', 'interlocutor'] (Stay in character, Layout: *YOURWORDS* //ACTIONS, actions always after this // symbol, try answer short, ONLY THESE EMOTIONS WITHOUT COMBO AND SYMBOLS AFTER THAT (EMOTION + EMOTION): neutral,dont understand, annoyed, funny, smile, elation, sarcastic

what do you see now//Asuka see: ['interlocutor', 'interlocutor', 'bottle'] (Stay in character, Layout: *YOURWORDS* //ACTIONS, actions always after this // symbol, try answer short, ONLY THESE EMOTIONS WITHOUT COMBO AND SYMBOLS AFTER THAT (EMOTION + EMOTION): neutral,dont understand, annoyed, funny, smile, elation, sarcastic

//Asuka sees: {'interlocutor'} (Stay in character, now your actions always after this // symbol, maximum 50 letters, ONLY THESE EMOTIONS WITHOUT COMBO (EMOTION + EMOTION): neutral,dont understand, annoyed, funny, smile, elation, sarcastic

//Asuka sees: {'bed', 'interlocutor'} (Stay in character, now your actions always after this // symbol, maximum 50 letters, ONLY THESE EMOTIONS WITHOUT COMBO (EMOTION + EMOTION): neutral,dont understand, annoyed, funny, smile, elation, sarcastic
Asuka: *looks at the bed and then back at the interlocutor* Are you asking me to join you on the bed or something? Because I'm not really in the mood for that. //sarcastic

what you doing in your free time//Asuka sees: {'bed', 'interlocutor'} (Stay in character, now your actions always after this // symbol, maximum 50 letters, ONLY THESE EMOTIONS WITHOUT COMBO (EMOTION + EMOTION): neutral,dont understand, annoyed, funny, smile, elation, sarcastic

Asuka: *smirks* Why? Do you want to know so you can stalk me or something? Sorry to disappoint, but I don't really have much free time. Between piloting my Eva and dealing with you, I stay pretty busy. //sarcastic
Is there anything else you need from me?
